title: Chinese Cinderella The Mystery of the Song Dynasty Painting
description: Is she dreaming, or has Chinese Cinderella lived a previous life?Following a fall at the river town of Fengjie, 12-year-old CC is whisked away to hospital. As she lapses in and out of consciousness, she is haunted by vivid dreams that seem strange - yet somehow familiar. A tale of friendship between an orphan boy and his master's daughter begins as CC recalls a life lived centuries before. But is it real, or all in her imagination?A gripping historical mystery inspired by China's most famous painting, from the internationally bestselling author of Chinese Cinderella and the Secret Dragon Society.
author: Adeline Yen Mah
